text: Bayes is the surname of: *Thomas Bayes (1702–1761), British mathematician, statistician and religious leader *Joshua Bayes (1671–1746), English nonconformist minister and father of Thomas. *Gilbert Bayes (1872–1953), British sculptor *Nora Bayes (1880–1928), American singer and actress *Paul Bayes (born 1953), Bishop in the Church of England *Andrew Bayes (born 1978), American football player *Walter Bayes, British painter (1869–1956) ==See also== *Bayesian probability, Bayes' theorem, and Bayes estimator, concepts in probability and statistics named after Thomas Bayes
title: Bayes
